analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/28/0x662d0548bf1225391f371ead2f2bee884679a6f2.sol:
	Contract ERC827Token has payable functions:
	 - approveAndCall (/unique_chucks/28/0x662d0548bf1225391f371ead2f2bee884679a6f2.sol#348-357)
	 - transferAndCall (/unique_chucks/28/0x662d0548bf1225391f371ead2f2bee884679a6f2.sol#380-386)
	 - transferFromAndCall (/unique_chucks/28/0x662d0548bf1225391f371ead2f2bee884679a6f2.sol#408-414)
	 - increaseApprovalAndCall (/unique_chucks/28/0x662d0548bf1225391f371ead2f2bee884679a6f2.sol#440-448)
	 - decreaseApprovalAndCall (/unique_chucks/28/0x662d0548bf1225391f371ead2f2bee884679a6f2.sol)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
